--- title: "Analysis of covariance" --- ## Content - Analysis of covariance and linear regression models ## Learning objectives At the end of the session, students should be capable of - explain the benefits ANCOVA over completely randomized designs - using control covariates - testing equality of slopes ## Readings - {{< fa book >}} [Chapter 9](https://lbelzile.github.io/math80667a/ancova.html) of the course notes ## Complementary readings - {{< fa book >}} Chapter 6 of @Maxwell.Delaney.Kelley:2017. - Chapter 14--15 of @Keppel/Wickens:2004 ## Slides
